title: (x) "this way brouwn" geometric sans - Neuzeit Grotesk (Geometric 706) {Skylar Fein}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144141im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/thiswaybrouwn_3754.jpg)

Can anyone ID this font please?

 [‹ (x) 2006 Burton Snowboard Catalog - Blender {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144141/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15975 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Finnmark logo sans - Bell Gothic {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144141/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29099 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Povl

comments.content:
Looks Futura-esque but for that ’t’. Similar fonts with the tailed t include Drescher Grotesk, Super Grotesk but both have higher ascenders. It’s rare to find that t with a single storey a.

Whoops! Slow in posting - I think it is Geometric 706.
Looks like the right one. Thanks guys.

If you want a letterpress or rough look straight from the box, try [Metallophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144141/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=2&displayfontid=MSF.118748.0.0&fontRendererText=this+way+brouwn).
FYI — Geometric 706 is Bitstream’s version of [Neuzeit Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607144141/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=neuzeit+grotesk).
